# iru_prism_desktop_screensaver (Data Source)

List desktop and screensaver information from Prism.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_prism_desktop_screensaver" "example" {}

output "desktop_info" {
  value = data.iru_prism_desktop_screensaver.example.results
}
```

- `device_id` (String)
- `device_name` (String)

- `marketing_name` (String)
- `os_version` (String)
- `serial_number` (String)
